text: Place is good and nice location. Food is normal nothing special. Also expensive. If owner make few changes can surely get more crowd.

Food is absolutely delicious. The dishes are extremely flavourful, each with just the right amount of spice. One thing that stood out was the papadum which was crispy and full of flavour. Service was good would definitely recommend
food is good! especially the fish curry and chicken dum briyani. service is great, very attentive to detail and polite. place is clean and aircon is strong üòÅ. highly recommended.

Excellent üëå The chicken is so tender and the cooking so perfect that it makes a big difference. The atmosphere, the temperature (no freezing AC) help as well to spend a good time
I have been impressed by the number of orders (grab, deliveroo, food panda and others... ) sign the place is know for its good food and quality

Fantastic place for lunches on working days. Not only their food but also their service is excellent.
Had my Express Lunch there. Vegetarian one is 9.9 while non Veg is 11.9 which comes to 13.1 with Service Charge.
Today's lunch had Lassi, Pani puri (4 pieces), Hot n sour soup, Papad, Chicken masala, Daal Makhni, Also Methi, Baigan ki sabzi, Chana bhindi, plain rice, Naan and Sabudana as dessert. Meal is quite sumptuous,  quality is good and service very quick. They even asked to refill the rice.
Veg one is definitely worth it while non Veg I felt was a bit expensive.
Overall excellent food and excellent service too.
PS: You can add masal tea for just 1SGD as a bonus.
14Sep2022: writing this review for their Veg Takeaway Thali. Worth the money. Comes with 3-4 dishes, Naan, Rice, Pakodas and Dessert. Mine had Palak Paneer, Aloo Gobhi, Mix Veg, Aloo pakoda, rice, naan and Payasam. All v tasty. Thali  costed SGD 8.3 and it was absolutely more than worth the money.
